    • Uses of QFunction in org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.tabular

      Subinterfaces of QFunction in org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.tabular 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TabularQFunction
      Interface for tabular representation of Q-functions.
      Classes in org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.tabular that implement QFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HashQFunction
      Represents the Q-function with the help of a hash-map.
      class  QFunctionFromValueFunction
      This QFunction has an internal ValueFunction and uses the fact, that Q(s,a) = sum_{s'} p(s'|s,a)(r(s,a,s') + gamma V(s')) Therefore the transition function p(s'|s,a), the reward function r(s,a,s') and the discount factor gamma is needed.
